title: Elon Musk's untaxed wealth is helping to finance his Twitter buyout - Moneycontrol
content: Elon Musk's untaxed wealth is helping to finance his Twitter buyout  Moneycontrol
description: The head of Tesla Inc. and SpaceX announced Monday an agreement to take Twitter private for $54.20 a share, pledging to equity finance $21 billion himself and use a $12.5 billion loan with his Tesla shares as collateral.
